description: Sets the number of days before the AppInstanceUser is automatically deleted.

parameters.name: ExpirationSettings
parameters.description: Settings that control the interval after which an AppInstanceUser is automatically deleted. The period in days after which an AppInstanceUser will be automatically deleted. Specifies the conditions under which an AppInstanceUser will expire.

nested_params.name: ExpirationDays
nested_params.description: The period in days after which an AppInstanceUser will be automatically deleted.

nested_params.name: ExpirationCriterion
nested_params.description: Specifies the conditions under which an AppInstanceUser will expire.

nested_items.name: ExpirationSettings
nested_items.description: Settings that control the interval after which an AppInstanceUser is automatically deleted.

nested_items.name: ExpirationDays
nested_items.description: The period in days after which an AppInstanceUser will be automatically deleted.

nested_items.name: ExpirationCriterion
nested_items.description: Specifies the conditions under which an AppInstanceUser will expire.
